shop.views.contact_view(request)[source]

Handles the contact form submission.

Parameters:

(HttpRequest) (request) – The HTTP request object.

Returns HttpResponse:

The rendered response containing the ‘contact_template.html’ template (if the form is submitted) or the initial ‘contact_template.html’ template.
